TITLE: ISC Bind 10.x Remote Shell Injection Vulnerability in Patch(1)
STATUS_EXPLANATION: Added by a user and Added by a user
SOLUTIONS: Mitigate by IPS:(general): activate a corresponding signature of an IPS device.;Upgrade:10.1-RELEASE-p16, 10.2-RC1-p1, 10.2-BETA2-p2:Upgrade ISC, BIND to version 10.1-RELEASE-p16, 10.2-RC1-p1, 10.2-BETA2-p2: Upgrade Bind to version 10.1-RELEASE-p16, 10.2-RC1-p1, 10.2-BETA2-p2 or later to resolve this issue. https://www.freebsd.org/security/advisories/FreeBSD-SA-15:14.bsdpatch.asc;
